がらがら: (がらがら) - clattering/rattling/gargling; empty/bare/uninhabited/vacant/unoccupied; raspy (voice)/gravelly; rattle (e.g. baby's toy)

がら空き: (garaaki) - praticamente vazio, bastante vazio; mal defendido, indefeso
がり: (ガリ) - sliced ginger prepared in vinegar (served with sushi)/pickled ginger; mimeograph; (usu. as がりを食う) reprimand/rebuke/censure/reproof; overly skinny person
がり勉: (がりべん) - drudge/grind/swot/someone who studies too much; cram-study (for exam, etc.)/swotting
がる: (がる) - (on adj-stem to represent a third party's apparent emotion) to show signs of being/to feel/to think; to behave as if one were/to pretend/to act as if; to want/to desire/to be anxious to/to be eager to
がん: (がん) - thump/thud (dull sound representing something being hit); severe/difficult/hard

がん首をそろえる: (がんくびをそろえる) - to sit silently at a meeting

が聞いて呆れる: (がきいてあきれる) - who do you think you're kidding by saying (used to indicate incredulous dismissal of some claim); What a laugh!

きせ分: (きせぶん) - excess of fold beyond the stitching seam

きっきゅう如: (きっきゅうじょ) - deferential; humble; reverent; respectful

きっぱり: (きっぱりと) - clearly; plainly; decisively; distinctly; flatly
きっぱりと: (きっぱりと) - clearly; plainly; decisively; distinctly; flatly
